name: CubeHop
description:
It's been 4 months since I started getting into game development and felt it was about time that I finally started making my very first one. (CubeHop).

CubeHop took me around 2 months to make and though it's a pretty simple game, I am honestly proud of my progress.

The game is currently listed on the Google Play Store and I would truly appreciate it if you are willing to give my game a try there too. In the store, It is unfortunately available for Android phones only.

Any feedback at all is very welcomed.
